description: This file defines the AuthService class for handling user authentication in a Flutter app. It manages user login, registration, JWT token storage, and checking authentication status, interfacing with a FastAPI backend.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Handles registration, login, JWT storage, and token fetch for API requests.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts user login with API, returns a map indicating success and message.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Attempts user registration, returns a map indicating success and message.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks if a user is authenticated by verifying stored JWT token.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs user out by deleting stored JWT token.

methods.name: getJwtToken
methods.description: Retrieves JWT token from secure storage.
